attributes.background: I want the government or anybody else in charge to make Friday apart of weekends my reason for this is children suffer in school.And they learn 5 times a week and only get a 2 day holiday.so by making Friday apart of it will give children a break

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Change the school week to a four day week:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643506
